entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,66004}Hoy, that's no starlit sky. I can{F801}faintly make out bedrock on the{F801}ceiling...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,66004}Hoy, that's no starlit sky. I can{F801}faintly make out bedrock on the{F801}ceiling...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,0,66005}Ah, that must be the magic of the{F801}Unclean Ones. I've read about their{F801}power to light buildings...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,0,66005}Ah, that must be the magic of the{F801}Unclean Ones. I've read about their{F801}power to light buildings...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,66006}Then... that is the Unclean Ones'{F801}country. Quite a startling sight.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,66006}Then... that is the Unclean Ones'{F801}country. Quite a startling sight.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,66008}This metal door here... Could it be{F801}the entrance to this hall?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,66009}But I don't see a knob... How is one{F801}meant to open it?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,66008}This metal door here... Could it be{F801}the entrance to this hall?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,66009}But I don't see a knob... How is one{F801}meant to open it?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,66010}I can field this one. It's a transport{F801}device called an elevator.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,66011}It lets people go easily up or down{F801}between each floor.{F801}{F802}{F813,1,400062}Activating scan mode...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,66010}I can field this one. It's a transport{F801}device called an elevator.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,66011}It lets people go easily up or down{F801}between each floor.{F801}{F802}{F813,1,400062}Activating scan mode...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,66012}The electricity is definitely on,{F801}so you should be able to ride it{F801}by pushing the button near the door.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,66012}The electricity is definitely on,{F801}so you should be able to ride it{F801}by pushing the button near the door.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F813,0,66013}Illuminating buildings and vertical{F801}transports... The Unclean Ones have{F801}some very interesting magic.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F813,0,66013}Illuminating buildings and vertical{F801}transports... The Unclean Ones have{F801}some very interesting magic.{F801}
